oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Clay Treadway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Henry Clay Treadway standing outside a tent at the reunion of his Confederate regiment in Gettysburg, Pennslyvania. Treadway fought at the Battle of Gettysburg and was captured and taken prisoner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
